scripts.postinstall: cd "AI For Social Impact Director" && npm install
scripts.install:all: cd "AI For Social Impact Director" && npm install
scripts.dev: cd "AI For Social Impact Director" && next dev
scripts.build: cd "AI For Social Impact Director" && next build
scripts.export: cd "AI For Social Impact Director" && next build
scripts.start: cd "AI For Social Impact Director" && next start
scripts.lint: cd "AI For Social Impact Director" && next lint
scripts.server: cd "AI For Social Impact Director" && node server.js
scripts.server:dev: cd "AI For Social Impact Director" && nodemon server.js
